summary.span: 这是与相应的 COM 对象的互操作性的托管代码需要 COM coclass 中的主接口。

span.span: This is a primary interface in a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

summary.span: 仅当您想要使用的方法共享相同的名称的 COM 对象; 事件时，才使用此主接口在这种情况下，强制转换为此接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: Use this primary interface only when the method you want to use shares the same name as an event of the COM object; in this case, cast to this interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

summary.span: 否则，使用.NET 接口派生自 COM coclass 访问方法、 属性和事件的 COM 对象。

span.span: Otherwise, use the .NET interface that is derived from the COM coclass to access methods, properties, and events of the COM object.

summary.span: 有关 COM 对象的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the COM object, see .

此属性返回Nothing （中的空引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing) C#） 如果没有内嵌响应的阅读窗格中可见。
You can use most of the properties and methods of the object on this item. You cannot use the following methods:
This property returns Nothing (a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) in C#) if no inline response is visible in the Reading Pane.

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: 如果没有内嵌响应是可见的阅读窗格中，则此属性返回Nothing （中的空引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing) C#）。返回的 Word文档对象提供了访问大部分 Word 对象模型，除以下成员：

This property returns Nothing (a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) in C#) if no inline response is visible in the Reading Pane. The returned Word Document object provides access to most of the Word object model except for the following members:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddToSelection([in]object Item) runtime managed

param.name: Item
param.span: 添加到活动资源管理器中选定内容的项目。

span.span: The item to add to the selection in the active explorer.

summary.span: 将指定的Microsoft Outlook项添加到活动资源管理器中的选定内容。

span.span: Adds the specified Microsoft Outlook item to the selection in the active explorer.

span.para: 活动资源管理器中的选定内容由对象返回的属性。
要选定的项必须是在活动资源管理器当前视图中。使用方法以确定是否可在视图中选择项目。项目没有为视图中可见。
以下情况下，Outlook 将返回错误时调用AddToSelection方法：

item.para: 指定的项目在活动资源管理器的当前视图不是。
活动浏览器的当前视图中处于编辑的指定的项。
被筛选出当前视图和筛选器的应用程序从视图中移除项目。
没有当前视图存在活动资源管理器。

span.para: 如果项目未选中并且可选的当前视图中，调用AddToSelection原因触发事件。
调用AddToSelection不会滚动视图来使选定的项目视图中可见和不展开或折叠视图中的组。
下表说明了调用AddToSelection考虑任何当前所选内容的结果 (属性) 以及阅读窗格是否显示。
span.description:
项目
0被添加到选定内容。SelectionChange触发。阅读窗格显示项目。
0无项目添加到选定内容。SelectionChange激发。
>= 1项目添加到选定内容。SelectionChange触发。阅读窗格不会更改其显示的项目除非视图是日历视图，在这种情况下，调用AddToSelection可能会导致阅读窗格显示其他项目。
>= 1无项目添加到选定内容。SelectionChange激发。
如果指定的项已选中活动资源管理器中，调用AddToSelection不会引起任何更改对所选内容，并不会触发SelectionChange事件。当您定期约会或任务中指定项目，如AddToSelection方法参数，请确保您传递参数之前，您获取的匹配项实例的第一个扩展定期事件，使用
属性和集合。如果您不展开定期事件并获取出现系列中的，传递实例变量值，该值代表约会或任务的系列，并AddToSelection方法而不是出现系列上运行。
请注意，您可以使用AddToSelection将项目添加到选定内容，但不能将对话标头添加到选定内容。

span.para: The selection in the active explore is represented by the object that is returned by the property.

To be selected, the item must be selectable in the current view of the active explorer. Use the method to determine whether the item can be selected in the view. The item does not have to be visible in the view.
Under the following conditions, Outlook returns an error when you call the AddToSelection method:

item.para: The specified item is not in the current view of the active explorer.
The specified item is being edited in the current view of the active explorer.
The current view has been filtered and the application of the filter removed the item from the view.
The specified item has not been saved.
No current view exists for the active explorer.

span.para: If the item is not selected and is selectable in the current view, calling AddToSelection causes the event to fire.
Calling AddToSelection does not scroll the view to make the selected item visible in the view and does not expand or collapse groups in the view.
The following table illustrates the results of calling AddToSelection, taking into consideration any current selection (the property) and whether the Reading Pane is displayed.

item.description: The item is added to the selection.SelectionChange fires.Reading Pane displays the item.
The item is added to the selection.SelectionChange fires.

The item is added to the selection.SelectionChange fires.Reading Pane does not change the item it displays unless the view is a Calendar view, in which case, calling AddToSelection can cause the Reading Pane to display a different item.
The item is added to the selection.SelectionChange fires.

span.para: If the specified item is already selected in the active explorer, calling AddToSelection does not result in any change to the selection and the SelectionChange event does not fire.

When you specify an item in a recurring appointment or task as an argument to the AddToSelection method, make sure that before you pass the argument, you obtain an instance of the occurrence by first expanding the recurrences, using the property and the collection. If you do not expand the recurrences and obtain an occurrence in the series, you pass an instance variable that represents the appointment or task series, and the AddToSelection method operates on the series instead of the occurrence.
Note that you can use AddToSelection to add items to a selection, but you cannot add conversation headers to a selection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ClearSearch() runtime managed

summary.span: 清除来自 Microsoft 即时搜索结果如果结果显示在资源管理器中。

span.span: Clears results from a Microsoft Instant Search in an if results are displayed in the Explorer.

span.para: 此方法的功能是类似于即时搜索中清除按钮。
，如果不含搜索结果显示在浏览器， ClearSearch中将不执行任何操作。如果当前视图的资源管理器没有显示搜索视图， ClearSearch将不会引发错误。
The functionality of this method is analogous to the Clear button in Instant Search.
If no search results are displayed in the Explorer, ClearSearch will not take any action. If the current view of the Explorer does not present a search view, ClearSearch will not raise an error.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ClearSelection() runtime managed

summary.span: 取消活动资源管理器中的任何选择。

span.span: Cancels any selection in the active explorer.

span.para: 调用ClearSelection方法后，属性对象的属性返回零。那么，除非之前的ClearSelection呼叫，当前视图不包含任何项目、 当前文件夹为空，或者Count属性已为零，会触发事件。
如果当前视图是表视图是可见的阅读窗格中，调用ClearSelection呈现阅读窗格为空。
如果当前视图或当前文件夹不包含任何项目，调用ClearSelection不会引起任何更改对所选内容并不会触发SelectionChange事件。
如果当前视图中处于编辑项目， ClearSelection将返回错误。

After the ClearSelection method is called, the property of the object that the property returns is zero. Then, the event fires unless prior to calling of ClearSelection, the current view did not contain any items, the current folder was empty, or the Count property was already zero.
If the Reading Pane is visible and the current view is a table view, calling ClearSelection renders the Reading Pane blank.
If the current view or current folder does not contain any items, calling ClearSelection does not result in any change to the selection and does not fire the SelectionChange event.
ClearSelection returns an error if the item is being edited in the current view.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() runtime managed

summary.span: 关闭对象。

span.span: Closes the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::MAPIFolder ^ CurrentFolder { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::MAPIFolder ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::MAPIFolder ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置对象，表示在浏览器中显示的当前文件夹。

span.span: Returns or sets a object that represents the current folder displayed in the explorer.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 使用此属性可更改用户正在查看的文件夹。
Use this property to change the folder the user is viewing.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ CurrentView { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个代表当前视图的对象。

span.span: Returns or sets an Object representing the current view.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 若要获取对象的当前视图，使用Explorer.CurrentView ，而不是使用属性的当前返回对象。
必须先保存由CurrentView返回，然后您才能继续用于任何目的View对象的引用。
正确重置当前视图中，您必须执行，然后。下面的代码示例说明了的呼叫顺序：
span.code: Sub ResetView() Dim v as Outlook.View ' Save a reference to the current view object Set v = Application.ActiveExplorer().CurrentView ' Reset and then apply the current view v.Reset v.Apply End Sub
span.para: 设置此属性时，两个事件发生：发生之前发生，可以使用取消更改这些实际大小视图更改和发生更改将生效之后。
To obtain a object for the view of the current , use Explorer.CurrentView instead of the property of the current object returned by .
You must save a reference to the View object returned by CurrentView before you proceed to use it for any purpose.
To properly reset the current view, you must do a and then a . The code sample below illustrates the order of the calls:
span.code: Sub ResetView() Dim v as Outlook.View ' Save a reference to the current view object Set v = Application.ActiveExplorer().CurrentView ' Reset and then apply the current view v.Reset v.Apply End Sub
span.para: When this property is set, two events occur: occurs before the actual view change takes place and can be used to cancel the change and takes place after the change is effective.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DeselectFolder([in]class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.MAPIFolder Folder) runtime managed

summary.span: 此对象、成员或枚举已被弃用并且不适合在您的代码中使用。

span.span: This object, member, or enumeration is deprecated and is not intended to be used in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Display() runtime managed

summary.span: 显示一个新对象的文件夹。

span.span: Displays a new object for the folder.

remarks.span:
Display方法支持为了向后兼容的浏览器和检查器窗口。若要激活的资源管理器或检查器窗口，请使用方法。如果您尝试使用 Microsoft Outlook 对象模型中打开"不安全的"文件系统对象 （或"freedoc"文件）
，E_FAIL 返回代码中收到 C 或 c + + 编程语言。在 Outlook 2000 和更早版本，您无法使用Display方法打开"不安全的"文件系统对象。

span.para: The Display method is supported for explorer and inspector windows for the sake of backward compatibility. To activate an explorer or inspector window, use the method.

If you attempt to open an "unsafe" file system object (or "freedoc" file) by using the Microsoft Outlook object model, you receive the E_FAIL return code in the C or C++ programming languages. In Outlook 2000 and earlier, you could open an "unsafe" file system object by using the Display method.

In order to use this property, a folder must be using a folder home page, or you can set the property of the object to a Web page.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsItemSelectableInView([in]object Item) runtime managed
Public Function IsItemSelectableInView (Item As Object) As Boolean

span.span: The item that is being considered for selection.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示指定的 Microsoft Outlook项目 在活动资源管理器的当前视图中是否可选择。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified Microsoft Outlook item can be selected in the current view of the active explorer.

returns.span: 返回(bool的 C#) 值，该值指示是否可在当前视图中选择的指定的项。

span.span: Returns a (bool for C#) value that indicates whether the specified item can be selected in the current view.

remarks.span:
返回True如果可以在当前视图; 中选定项否则返回False。
方法返回True或False ，具体取决于是否在视图中的项目。它不指示项目是否在视图中可见。如果该项目包含在折叠视图中的组中，该方法返回False。
如果单元格内编辑活动浏览器的当前视图打开并且单元格内编辑正在进行的项，该方法返回False。如果当前视图是表视图，您可以检查的单元格内编辑使用属性对象。同样，如果当前视图是卡片视图，则可以使用属性对象。当您定期约会或任务中指定项目，如参数， IsItemSelectableInView方法，请确保您传递参数之前，您获取的匹配项实例的第一个扩展定期事件，使用
如果当前视图是对话视图， IsItemSelectableInView方法将引发错误。

span.para: Returns True if the item can be selected in the current view; otherwise returns False.

The method returns True or False depending on whether the item is selectable in the view. It does not indicate whether the item is visible in the view. If the item is contained within a collapsed group in the view, the method returns False.

If in-cell editing is turned on for the current view for the active explorer and in-cell editing is in progress on the item, the method returns False. If the current view is a table view, you can check for in-cell editing by using the property of the object. Similarly, if the current view is a card view, you can use the property of the object.

When you specify an item in a recurring appointment or task as argument to the IsItemSelectableInView method, make sure that before you pass the argument, you obtain an instance of the occurrence by first expanding the recurrences, using the property and the collection. If you do not expand the recurrences and obtain an occurrence in the series, you would be passing an instance variable that represents the appointment or task series, and the IsItemSelectableInView method would be operating on the series instead of the occurrence.
The IsItemSelectableInView method raises an error if the current view is a conversation view.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsPaneVisible([in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlPane Pane) runtime managed
Public Function IsPaneVisible (Pane As OlPane) As Boolean

span.span: Returns a Boolean (bool in C#) indicating whether a specific explorer pane is visible.

returns.span: 如此 如果在指定窗格中显示在资源管理器;否则为 假 。

span.span: True if the specified pane is displayed in the explorer; otherwise, False.

span.para: 您还可以使用属性对象确定快捷方式窗格是否可见。
You can also use the property of the object to determine whether the Shortcuts pane is visible.

span.span: Returns or sets an Integer (int in C#) value specifying the position (in pixels) of the left vertical edge of an explorer window from the edge of the screen.

span.span: Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveFromSelection([in]object Item) runtime managed

param.name: Item
param.span: 要从选定内容中移除的项目。

span.span: The item to be removed from the selection.

summary.span: 取消选中活动资源管理器中指定的 Microsoft Outlook项目。

span.span: Cancels the selection of the specified Microsoft Outlook item in the active explorer.

remarks.span:
活动资源管理器中的选定内容由对象返回的属性。
要删除项必须是在活动资源管理器当前视图中。使用方法以确定是否可在视图中选择项目。项目没有为视图中可见。
以下情况下，Outlook 将返回错误时调用RemoveFromSelection方法：
指定的项目在活动资源管理器的当前视图不是。
活动浏览器的当前视图中处于编辑的指定的项。
被筛选出当前视图和筛选器的应用程序从视图中移除项目。
尚未保存的指定的项。
指定的项目表示。
当前视图是对话视图。
没有当前视图存在活动资源管理器。
如果选择项目，则调用RemoveFromSelection原因
触发事件。如果未选择项目，调用RemoveFromSelection不会触发SelectionChange事件。
调用RemoveFromSelection不会滚动视图来使选定的项目视图中可见和不展开或折叠视图中的组。
下表说明了调用RemoveFromSelection，考虑任何当前所选内容的结果 (属性)、 阅读窗格显示，以及是否中显示的指定的项阅读窗格。是的 是选定内容被清除
1。SelectionChange触发。阅读窗格为空。
>1是无项已从所选内容。SelectionChange触发。阅读窗格没变化。
>1是是项已从所选内容。SelectionChange触发。阅读窗格显示所选内容的下一个项目或旁边的项目。
>= 1无n/A项已从所选内容。SelectionChange激发。
如果指定的项的当前视图中存在但未选定在于视图调用RemoveFromSelection不会引起任何更改对所选内容，并且不会触发SelectionChange事件。当您在定期约会或任务指定项目，如RemoveFromSelection方法参数，请确保您传递参数之前，您获取的匹配项实例的第一个扩展定期事件，使用

span.para: The selection in the active explore is represented by the object that is returned by the property.

To be removed, an item must be selectable in the current view of the active explorer. Use the method to determine whether the item can be selected in the view. The item does not have to be visible in the view.
Under the following conditions, Outlook returns an error when you call the RemoveFromSelection method:

item.para: The specified item is not in the current view of the active explorer.
The specified item is being edited in the current view of the active explorer.
The current view has been filtered and the application of the filter removed the item from the view.
The specified item has not been saved.
The current view is a conversation view.
No current view exists for the active explorer.

span.para: If the item is selected, calling RemoveFromSelection causes the event to fire. If the item is not selected, calling RemoveFromSelection will not cause the SelectionChange event to fire.
Calling RemoveFromSelection does not scroll the view to make the selected item visible in the view and does not expand or collapse groups in the view.

The following table illustrates the results of calling RemoveFromSelection, taking into consideration any current selection (the property), whether the Reading Pane is displayed, and whether the specified item is displayed in the Reading Pane.

item.description: The selection is cleared.SelectionChange fires.Reading Pane is empty.
The item is removed from the selection.SelectionChange fires.Reading Pane does not change.
The item is removed from the selection.SelectionChange fires.Reading Pane displays the next item or adjacent item in the selection.
The item is removed from the selection.SelectionChange fires.

span.para: If the specified item exists in the current view but is not selected in that view calling RemoveFromSelection does not result in any change to the selection and the SelectionChange event does not fire.

When you specify an item in a recurring appointment or task as an argument to the RemoveFromSelection method, make sure that before you pass the argument, you obtain an instance of the occurrence by first expanding the recurrences, using the property and the collection. If you do not expand the recurrences and obtain an occurrence in the series, you would be passing an instance variable that represents the appointment or task series, and the RemoveFromSelection method would be operating on the series instead of the occurrence.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Search([in]string Query, [in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlSearchScope SearchScope) runtime managed
Public Sub Search (Query As String, SearchScope As OlSearchScope)

param.name: Query
param.span: 可以包含即时搜索功能所支持的任何有效关键字的搜索字符串。

span.span: A search string that can contain any valid keywords supported in Instant Search.

param.name: SearchScope
param.span: 从文件夹的角度指定搜索范围。

span.span: Specifies the scope in terms of folders for the search.

summary.span: 对显示在资源管理器中使用的当前文件夹执行 Microsoft 即时搜索给定。

span.span: Performs a Microsoft Instant Search on the current folder displayed in the Explorer using the given .

span.para: 类似于即时搜索中的搜索按钮Explorer.Search的功能。它的行为就好像用户键入即时搜索用户界面中的查询字符串，然后单击搜索。 当调用Search时，查询将运行在用户界面中，并且没有编程的机制来获取搜索结果。即时搜索的详细信息，查询 Outlook 帮助中的"即时搜索"。
Search方法不提供回调功能，开发人员无法确定搜索何时完成。

The functionality of Explorer.Search is analogous to the Search button in Instant Search. It behaves as if the user has typed the query string in the Instant Search user interface and then clicked Search. When calling Search, the query is run in the user interface, and there is no programmatic mechanism to obtain the search results. For more information on Instant Search, query for "Instant Search" in the Outlook Help.
The Search method does not provide a callback to enable the developer to determine when the search is complete.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SelectAllItems() runtime managed

summary.span: 选择包含在活动资源管理器当前视图中的所有项目。

span.span: Selects all items that are contained in the current view of the active explorer.

remarks.span:
如果一个或多个组折叠当前视图中，调用SelectAllItems不选择折叠组中的项目。仅扩展组中的项目所选。如果当前视图是日历视图的
，调用SelectAllItems选择视图中的所有约会和全天事件。日历视图中调用SelectAllItems不会在日常任务列表中选择项目。
会触发事件仅执行一次调用SelectAllItems方法后。
如果当前视图或当前文件夹不包含任何项目，调用SelectAllItems不会引起任何更改对所选内容并不会触发SelectionChange事件。
如果正在编辑项目在当前视图中，或者当前视图是对话视图， SelectAllItems将引发错误。

span.para: If one or more groups are collapsed in the current view, calling SelectAllItems does not select items in the collapsed groups. Only items in expanded groups are selected.

If the current view is a calendar view, calling SelectAllItems selects all appointments and all-day events in the view. Calling SelectAllItems on a calendar view does not select items in the Daily Task List.
The event fires only once after the SelectAllItems method is called.
If the current view or current folder does not contain any items, calling SelectAllItems does not result in any change to the selection and does not fire the SelectionChange event.
SelectAllItems raises an error if the item is being edited in the current view, or the current view is a conversation view.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SelectFolder([in]class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.MAPIFolder Folder) runtime managed

summary.span: 此对象、成员或枚举已被弃用并且不适合在您的代码中使用。

span.span: This object, member, or enumeration is deprecated and is not intended to be used in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Selection As Selection

summary.span: 返回对象包含的当前视图中选择一个或多个项目。

span.span: Returns a object consisting of one or more items selected in the current view.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: 如果当前文件夹是文件系统文件夹，或者当前显示 Microsoft Outlook 今日或 Web 视图的任何文件夹，此属性返回一个空集合。另外组标头处于选中状态，如果所选内容的Count属性返回零。

If the current folder is a file-system folder, or if Microsoft Outlook Today or any folder with a Web view is currently displayed, this property returns an empty collection. Also if a group header is selected, the Count property on the selection returns zero.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Session As NameSpace

summary.span: 返回对象的当前会话。

span.span: Returns the object for the current session.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: Session属性和可以交替使用方法来获取当前会话的NameSpace对象。这两个成员的作用相同。例如，以下语句对执行相同的功能：

The Session property and the method can be used interchangeably to obtain the NameSpace object for the current session. Both members serve the same purpose. For example, the following pairs of statements perform the same function:

span.span: The pane to display.

param.name: Visible
param.span: 真正 使窗格中可见， False 隐藏窗格。

summary.span: 在浏览器中显示或隐藏特定窗格。

span.span: Displays or hides a specific pane in the explorer.

span.para: 注意： 还可以使用属性对象显示或隐藏快捷方式窗格。
Note: You can also use the property of the object to display or hide the Shortcuts pane.
